entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 12:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -32.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -37.8°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 29. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 30 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
